text: Cairo is a small unincorporated community in Coal County, Oklahoma. It is 7 miles northeast of Coalgate, Oklahoma.Shirk, George. Oklahoma Place Names, 2nd ed. University of Oklahoma Press: Norman, Oklahoma. 1987. p.39. The community was named after the town of Cairo, Illinois. A post office operated in Cairo from March 28, 1902 to July 15, 1939. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Coal County, Oklahoma Category:Unincorporated communities in Oklahoma
title: Cairo, Oklahoma
